com.noelios.restlet.http

Class HttpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.data.Message
      • org.restlet.data.Request
        • com.noelios.restlet.http.HttpRequest

  • public class HttpRequest
extends Request
    Request wrapper for server HTTP calls.
    Author:
    Jerome Louvel
